attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to state of our economy and the over
stretched residents ie tax payers , 
There will come a time when there will not be enough tax payers to cover the amount of benefit and debts payed out .
Closing our imagration will help but it could be to late already the writing is on the wall .can t any one see it coming "anarchy"

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
